content: as featured in the june 2021 issue of i like crochet magazine for long summer days that begin at the farmer s market and end with a sunset walk on the beach you ll reach for your maui market bag crocheted in a dip-dye style and made to last in sturdy mercerized cotton yarn you ll want one in every color time weekend project skill level easy size 11 diameter bottom 28 cm 25 tall including handles 64 cm gauge 18 sts and 13 row = 4 10 cm in half_double_crochet in the round materials medium worsted weight yarn you will need about 370 yards 338 meters of yarn per bag about 185 yards 169 m each of the main color and contrast color yarns each sample bag used 2 balls of lion brand 24/7 cotton 100% mercerized cotton 186 yards 170 meters /100 grams 147 purple mc 1 ball and 143 lilac cc 1 ball or 144 magenta mc 1 ball and 142 rose cc 1 ball or 158 goldenrod mc 1 ball and 157 lemon cc 1 ball or 178 jade mc 1 ball and 116 succulent cc 1 ball or 108 denim mc 1 ball and 107 sky cc 1 ball hook us size f 4 0 mm and us size e 3 5 mm notions tapestry needle the pattern pdf includes 17 tutorial photos and has been professionally tech edited share your project with #mauimarketbag on instagram tag @prettypeacefulcrochet too please feel free to sell finished items made from this pattern as long as you give design credit as maui market bag crochet pattern by pretty peaceful not for commercial use please do not share photos of this pattern only share the link to the pattern pdf on ravelry or etsy thank you for your support
